column1: # PROVE Example Trace: Simple Two-Process Execution
# This trace demonstrates a basic two-process system where:
# - processes: process this event belongs to
# - vc: vector clock (Process:Count pairs separated by ;)
# - timestamp: global timestamp (used for epsilon-based ordering)
# - props: propositions true after this event (separated by |)
# - msg_partner: target (for send) or source (for receive) process
